name: Robert Cohen
description:
We recently received an almost perfect email in our suggestion box, which led to this profile being written in record time. Read and learn, correspondents!

Robert Cohen, one of my mother's first cousins: (link to Wikipedia article provided)

It's always a pleasure when readers ask to profile their famous relatives, which this one clearly is, and the suggester was kind enough to provide a link. No need to search for this Robert Cohen among numerous others!

World champion of boxing in 1954 in Bangkok.

That he was! The Algerian-born French boxer was World Bantamweight Champion from 1954 to 1956, all 5'3" (1.59m) of him.

Another Jewish athlete on your site.

We do love to profile those somewhat-obscure Jewish athletes, especially champions!

Congratulation for your humorous profiles!

A perfect way to end the email and this profile.
